fr.ign.cogit.cartagen.genealgorithms.polygon

Class VisvalingamWhyatt

  • Object
    • VisvalingamWhyatt

  • public class VisvalingamWhyatt
extends Object
    Implementation of the Visvilingam-Whyatt (1993) algorithm for line simplification by vertex filtering. It is more adapted to natural line than the Douglas&Peucker algorithm.
    Author:
    GTouya
